name: Kill Them All (wellios)
description:
This game is not finish ! It will take time with the other projects that I have.

You need to run, just run. And fight enemies to survive. Good luck !

PS : I would like your feedback on your gaming experience, on the UI, the UX. Thank you in advance.

PS2 : The game is difficult to learn at the beginning (not complete tutorial). So here's a little explanation :
            - One click to attack (up to 3 times)
            - Hold the click to jump
            - Release during the jump to do a nose-down attack (and descend more quickly)
